#set page=Google Sheets #set subPage=Anonymous data source setup
  1. Make sure your spreadsheet is public or accessible with link. Open up your spreadsheet in your browser, click on Share button, then Get sharable link , then Done
  2. Open up your spreadsheet in your browser, copy the URL, click on Retrieve from URL button, paste the URL and click on Parse button to fill Spreadsheet ID (alternatively read this article to learn how to obtain SpreadsheetID)
  3. Save settings
